DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics ODM-201 patient castrate resistant prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetics Study ODM-201 Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate Ongoing androgen deprivation therapy LHRH analogue antagonist bilateral orchiectomy Progressive metastatic disease Adequate bone marrow , hepatic , renal function Known metastases brain History malignancy within previous 5 year Known gastrointestinal disease procedure affect absorption Not able swallow study drug
